effect:

- Removed by the allocation of energy points equal to its strength.

name: Cyber Mage [C4]
effect:
Cyber mages are beings who have entrenched themselves so deeply within the internal technical realm of computer networks that they are more powerful there than in reality. They are in continuous virtual combat within cyber space.
- The one player with the strongest cyber mage in play (no ties) is allowed one extra card play and one extra card draw each turn.
- 1/2 its strength is added to one other cyber mage in play in the same fleet.

name: Cyber Mage [C6]
effect:
Cyber mages are beings who have entrenched themselves so deeply within the internal technical realm of computer networks that they are more powerful there than in reality. They are in continuous virtual combat within cyber space.
- The one player with the strongest cyber mage in play (no ties) is allowed one extra card play and one extra card draw each turn.
- 1/2 its strength is added to one other cyber mage in play in the same fleet.

name: Cyber Mites
effect:
A technologically altered computer virus strain that has beneficial effects for ship and base equipment.
- Allows all equipment on a ship or base to function without engagement energy.
- Adds 3 strength to all equipment cards and cyber mages at location.
- Destroyed when ship/base is destroyed.

name: Cyber-Programmer
effect:
These technicians mechanically link their brains with a computer for direct interfacing.
- No equipment cards may be damaged or destroyed at his location, except by destruction of the location.
- Adds current strength to any one cyber mage in play in the fleet.

name: Cyborg Death
effect:
Some dragons made preparations for an untimely demise by arranging for cyborg animation after death.
- Must be played on a dragon card.
- When destroyed, dragon is not discarded but is returned to 1/2 its maximum strength (round down, but not less than 1).
- Dragon may be targeted a second time immediately after this card is played to it.
- Dragon cannot exceed this new (1/2) strength by any means.

name: Defense Grid
effect:

- Two less damage from all hazard cards and mine explosions.
